articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Appeal to All Service Personnel, People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Appeal to All Service Personnel, People
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Tuesday sent an appeal "Let Us Create the 'Masikryong Speed' and Usher in New Heyday on All Fronts for Socialist Construction" to all service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					 Kim Jong Un said the construction of the Masik Pass Skiing Ground is a gigantic patriotic work initiated by the Workers' Party of Korea to provide the people with better cultural conditions by translating into reality President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's noble idea of loving the people.
					
					 The soldier-builders have achieved remarkable successes by cutting off natural rocks and steep mountain ranges and building skiing courses covering hundreds of thousands of square meters with more than a hundred thousand meters in a total length in a matter of less than one year since they had a ground-breaking ceremony, he said, and continued:
					
					 The construction of the skiing ground is such a huge project that it is hard for others to complete the project even in ten years.  But the WPK remains unchanged in its resolution to build a world-class skiing ground within this year and provide the people and school youth and children with a highly civilized and happy living conditions to enable them enjoy all blessings.
					
					 He expressed belief that the soldier-builders would wind up the construction of the skiing ground within this year by creating the "Masikryong Speed" by dint of indomitable mental power and persevering charge and that all the service personnel and people across the country would bring about a great leap forward and signal innovations on all fronts for socialist construction in that spirit.
					
					 The secret to completing the construction of the Masik Pass Skiing Ground ahead of schedule lies in giving fullest play to the mental power of the service personnel, he noted, adding Kim Jong Il's patriotism is the core of the mental power to be cherished by the soldier-builders.
					
					 He underscored the need to dynamically push ahead with the construction of the skiing ground by dint of great army-people unity, the mainstay of the Songun revolution and groundwork of society.
					
					 It is the intention and resolution of the WPK to raise a hot-wind of great innovations and upswing throughout the country by letting all people learn from the indomitable fighting spirit and work style being displayed by the soldiers in the construction of the skiing ground, he stressed.
					
					 He also underlined the need for the People's Army to make thorough-going preparations for combat and bring about uninterrupted innovations in all major construction projects and in the work for sprucing up the provinces, cities and counties.
					
					 He called on all the people including workers, farmers and intellectuals to further reenergize all the economic sectors of the country and positively contribute to implementing national economy plan by fully implementing the WPK's line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Posong Mushroom Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Posong Mushroom Farm
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the newly built Posong Mushroom Farm.
					 Going round various places of the farm, he acquainted himself in detail with fungus production, substrate preparation, cultivation process, etc.
					
					 Fungus production is important for cultivating mushrooms, he said, learning about how mushroom fungi are cultivated at the farm.
					
					 He went round the substrate production process of preparing and processing raw materials needed for production to suit the characteristic features of species of mushrooms.
					
					 Seeing equipment crushing trees and corncobs, materials producing substrates, and machine sterilizing various germs contained in raw materials, he said it is of particular importance to sterilize germs for producing substrates.
					
					 Making the round of the process of cultivating spores and inoculating substrates with fungi, he said it is possible to cultivate mushrooms anywhere if spores and substrates are prepared.
					
					 He looked round various cultivation grounds to learn about the mushroom cultivation methods.
					
					 At an air-tight cultivation ground he underlined the need to select a high-yielding mushroom species which meets the climatic and other specific conditions of the country, saying mushrooms differ from each other at temperature and humidity required by their species.
					
					 He underscored the need to cultivate high-yielding mushrooms including agarics which grow well at temperature below 20 degrees C with the output of more than 100 tons per hectare.
					
					 Going round the mushroom cultivation ground by use of vinyl sheet, he said it would be good to cultivate vegetables in summer.
					
					 He underlined the need to contribute to the diet of soldiers and people by building in various places such bases mass-producing mushrooms in an industrial method.
					
					 He called on the farm to mass-produce fungi to send them to mushroom farms to be built in the future and compile good technical guides for cultivating mushrooms in an industrial method for various units.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that all employees of the Posong Mushroom Farm would discharge their duty in a responsible manner true to the intention of the WPK and thus produce a large quantity of tasty and nutritive mushrooms for soldiers and people.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Kyong Ok and Choe Hwi, first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and Pak Thae Song and Hwang Pyong So, vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: S. Korea's Inhumane Allurement and Abduction of Youngsters of DPRK Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korea's Inhumane Allurement and Abduction of Youngsters of DPRK Denounced
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed recently that the south Korean puppet group attempted to tempt and abduct many youngsters of the DPRK to take them to south Korea.  A spokesman for the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society Wednesday made public a statement denouncing the unprecedented actions against humanity.
					 The south Korean authorities sent flesh traffic dealers under the guise of religionists to the northern border area of the DPRK to lure and abduct dozens of youngsters of the DPRK and detain them in a secret hide and commit all kinds of evil acts against them, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 These gangsters, who are old hands at inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen and hatching plots, forced the young people to recite bible and sing psalm in a bid to make them believe in God for two or three years, moving their lodgings several times to escape the control of a country concerned. They showed them undesirable films every day in a sinister attempt to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system and persistently resorted to brainwashing in an effort to create illusion about south Korea. 
					
					 When children refuse to properly receive religious education and brainwashing, these hooligans unhesitatingly beat them with iron-clubs and punished them.
					
					 The nine young people of the DPRK in question are just part of the victims of such abduction and brainwashing; the puppet group failed to carry out their sinister plan as they were checked while illegally taking the children to south Korea via foreign countries.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group to prodded flesh traffic dealers into luring and abducting young people of the DPRK by spending a huge amount of money in collaboration with a U.S. body to hatch plots against the DPRK over its "human rights". It tried hard to take them to south Korea, the U.S., etc., issuing false passports and providing air tickets to them through its mission in a foreign country. 
					
					  The recent case brought to light the puppet group's true nature of heinous flesh traffic and anti-DPRK human rights abuses.
					
					 The smear campaign of the puppet group is the last-ditch efforts to tarnish the image of the DPRK in a bid to stem the trend of the rapidly-changing international situation and get rid of its difficult position and tight corner.
					
					 It is also nothing but a cynical ploy to drive a wedge between the DPRK and countries concerned and bring into bolder relief the non-existent "human rights issue" in a bid to escalate the anti-DPRK campaign.
					
					 As far as the human rights issue is concerned, the puppet group should stand trial as it has turned south Korea into a theatre of fascist rowdyism and graveyard of democracy and human rights and put in custody those pro-reunification figures who visited the DPRK with compatriotic feelings after branding them as criminals.
					
					 The U.S. should be called into question, first of all, as it is the worst human rights abuser as evidenced by the facts that it is lording it over south Korea, committing rape, violence and murder and torturing and persecuting innocent prisoners in Guantanamo.
					
					 The puppet group together with riff-raffs of conspiratorial human rights organizations is getting frantic with the anti-DPRK human rights racket, raising a hue and cry over "guarantee of living of the forcibly deported school youth and children" whom it claims had defected from the north and institution of a "law on human rights in the north. But this only brings to light the group's true colors as anti-reunification confrontation elements.
					
					 The human rights of the popular masses including school youth and children are fully guaranteed in the DPRK where the socialist system centred on the popular masses has been fully established and there is a large family thanks to the politics of loving the people.
					
					 If the puppet group persists in such anti-DPRK human rights abuses as allurement and abduction of DPRK citizens despite its warnings, the group will have to pay a dear price for them.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Sweden
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Sweden
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting on June 1 to Carl Gustaf 16, king of Sweden, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message extended congratulations to the king and the people of Sweden, wishing it prosperity.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Sends Message of Sympathy to His Chinese Counterpart
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Sends Message of Sympathy to His Chinese Counterpart
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, as regards the big fire which recently occurred in Jilin Province, China, causing heavy casualties and property damage.
					 The message expressed deep consolation and sympathy to the government and the people of China, and the victims and their bereaved families, being convinced that the aftermath of the disaster would soon be cleared by the positive efforts of its government and people.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports of DPRK Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports of DPRK Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports of the DPRK led by Vice-Minister Son Kwang Ho returned home on June 4 after attending the assembly of the International Weightlifting Federation held in Russia, and the fifth international conference of ministers of Physical Culture and Sports held in Germany.

articles.title: Delegates to 7th KCU Congress Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegates to 7th KCU Congress Visit Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The delegates to the 7th Congress of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid wreaths and bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, grandparents of Kim Il Sung, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, his parents, and paid silent tribute to them.
					
					 After visiting the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, they went round historic relics preserved in the old home.
					
					 They also visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 They laid wreaths and bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk before paying tribute to her.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Arch of Triumph.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Hyong Jik
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statue of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea, in Ponghwa-ri, Kangdong County, Pyongyang and his grave in Mangyongdae on Wednesday, the 87th anniversary of his demise.
					 Seen before the statue and grave were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Ri Yong Mu, Kang Sok Ju, Mun Kyong Dok and other officials, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel and other people and schoolchildren.
					
					 Laid before the statue and grave were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also laid there were wreaths in the name of armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, revolutionary schools and educational institutions, and party and power organs, enterprises and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the brilliant revolutionary life of Kim Hyong Jik.
					
					 Wreaths and bouquets were also placed before his statues at Kim Hyong Jik Military Medical University and in Sakju and Junggang counties on the same day.

articles.title: Service Personnel Vow to Wind Up Construction of Skiing Ground within This Year
articles.content:
Service Personnel Vow to Wind Up Construction of Skiing Ground within This Year
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting of service personnel of the Korean People's Army took place on the spot on Wednesday to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth in an appeal sent by KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un "Let Us Create the 'Masikryong Speed' and Usher in New Heyday on All Fronts for Socialist Construction" and wind up the construction of the Masik Pass Skiing Ground within this year.
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, officials concerned, officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and service personnel.
					
					 An appeal sent by Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the appeal serves as inspiring banner instilling redoubled energy and courage into the service personnel.
					
					 In response to the historic appeal the service personnel will creditably fulfill their responsibility and role they have assumed before the era and history in the on-going sacred struggle to live up to the Supreme Commander's trust and expectation, they said, adding:
					
					 They will wind up the construction of the skiing ground in the shortest possible span of time as the first-line unit in creating the "Masikryong Speed"  with the same vim and vigor with which they created the Huichon speed. They will fully prove once again before the whole world that the resolution of the Supreme Commander precisely means practice.

articles.title: DPRK Law on Economic Development Zones Enacted
articles.content:
DPRK Law on Economic Development Zones Enacted
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK enacted a law on economic development zones.
					 A decree on the law was promulgated by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on May 29.
					
					 The law has seven chapters (62 articles) and additional rules (two articles).
					
					 The law deals with fundamentals of the law, establishment, development and management of economic development zones, economic transactions in the zones, their encouragement, preference and settlement of complaints and disputes.
					
					 According to the law, economic development zones are special economic zones in which preference is granted as for economic activities under the laws and regulations specially provided for by the state.
					
					 The economic development zones include industrial development zone, agricultural development zone, tourism development zone, exports processing zone, ultra-modern technological development zone and other development zones in the fields of the economy and science and technology.
					
					 The state will assort the economic development zones into local-level economic development zones and central-level economic development zones and manage them according to their affiliations.
					
					 Foreign corporate bodies, individuals and economic organizations and overseas Koreans can invest in the economic development zones and also set up businesses, branches and offices and conduct free economic activities.
					
					 The state shall provide investors with conditions for preferential economic activities regarding the use of land, employment of labor, payment of taxes, etc.
					
					 The state shall specially encourage investment in the fields of infrastructural construction and ultra-modern science and technology and in the field producing goods with high competitiveness in international market in the economic development zones.
					
					 Rights granted to investors and investment properties and legal income are protected by law in the zones.
					
					 The law on economic development zones and regulations and rules for its enforcement will be applied as for economic activities like development and management of the economic development zones and the operation of businesses. 
					
					 This law is not applied to the Rason Economic and Trade Zone, Hwanggumphyong and Wihwado economic zones, Kaesong Industrial Zone and Mt. Kumgang Tourist Special Zone.

articles.title: Rason Economic, Trade Zone in Korea
articles.content:
Rason Economic, Trade Zone in Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Rason Economic and Trade Zone in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, bordering northeast China and Russia's Far East with the River Tuman in between, serves as a transit centre for economic cooperation and trade in Northeast Asia.
					 The zone has specifically favorable harbor conditions, with Rajin, Sonbong, Chongjin and Ungsang ports built within the radius of 50 kilometers.
					
					 The ports can timely handle cargos on trade among Northeast Asian nations. They are directly connected to northeast China and Russia's Khasan by rails and road.
					
					 With Taecho and Socho islets as breakwaters, Rajin Port can be expanded and it is operational throughout the year.
					
					 The zone also boasts of geographical conditions good for developing economic cooperation among regional countries.
					
					  Generally, it takes two hours by air and one day by ship to reach any area and country in Northeast Asia from the zone.
					
					 With no route to the East Sea of Korea, northeast China's provinces of Jilin and Heilongjiang have trucked freights to Dalian Port in Liaoning Province for shipment to the Pacific nations.
					
					 The railway extension from Hunchun to Dalian is more than 1 200 kilometers, while from Hunchun to Rajin nearly 110 kilometers. The roads from Changchun of Jilin Province and Harbin of Heilongjiang Province to Rajin are 200 and 280 km respectively shorter than from those to Dalian.
					
					 Meanwhile, sea route from China's Dalian Port to Japan's Niigata Port covers 1 070 miles, while from Rajin Port to Niigata Port 475 miles. 
					
					 Rajin Port can also serve as a gateway to Europe from Northeast Asia.
					
					 The route from Kobe or Niigata ports of Japan to Rotterdam via Rajin Port takes three days earlier than that via Vladivostok Port and nine days earlier than that via Suez Canal.
					
					 At present many foreign firms are carrying on business activities in the zone and more businessmen have shown their willingness to invest in it.

articles.title: War Relics, Mementoes Collected in DPRK
articles.content:
War Relics, Mementoes Collected in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Citizens in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have presented a wave of relics and mementoes of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) for display at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum now under reconstruction.
					 More than 1 400 items of relics and mementoes in 100 kinds were collected from across the country at present.
					
					 Among them are photos of President Kim Il Sung which anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, Choe Hyon and Rim Chun Chu, had given to servicepersons.
					
					 And there are a suit of soldiers' padded clothes sent by Kim Il Sung, a certification of Distinguished Military Service Medal carrying his signature and a radio and an enlarger he gave to a soldier as gifts.
					
					 Blood-stained DPRK flags, reminiscent of hard-fought battles, were presented from Pyongyang, Chongjin and Wonsan cities. The flags had been regarded as the soul of martyrs and as heirlooms by war veterans and bereaved families.
					
					 The presentations also include military uniforms, decorations, petitions for party membership, diaries, hundreds of photos and letters, newspapers, literary works, musical instruments, a pair of binoculars, maps and compasses. Many decoration certificates carry Kim Il Sung's name.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Moves for U.S.-Japan-south Korea Triangular Military Alliance
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Moves for U.S.-Japan-south Korea Triangular Military Alliance
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The recent U.S.-Japan-south Korea joint military exercises staged in waters west of Kyusu, Japan hint at the fact that the  triangular  military alliance is actually operating as an entity and its military movements have become evermore undisguised.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S., Japan and south Korea asserted that the purpose of the joint military exercises is to search and rescue civilian ships in distress, but this is nothing but sophism to deceive the international community.
					
					 It is the sinister scenario of the U.S. to let the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance perform the same function as that of NATO and use it as a mechanism for carrying out the strategy to dominate the Asia-Pacific region including Northeast Asia.  
					
					 According to this scenario, the U.S. made sure that its forces present in south Korea were involved in the joint military exercises with Japan and its forces present in Japan took part in the joint military drills with south Korea. 
					
					 The U.S. forces present in Japan and south Korea played a traction role to link Japan and south Korea militarily, while freely traveling the two regions.
					
					 The joint Korea military exercises serve as a main factor of straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The moves to tighten the triangular military alliance through the joint military exercises are a threat and challenge to the peace on the peninsula and  in Asia and other parts of the world and acts of aggression.
					
					 The DPRK will not remain a passive onlooker to the moves of the U.S., Japan and south Korea to increase pressure upon the DPRK, while putting spurs to the formation of the alliance.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses Japan of Justifying Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses Japan of Justifying Sexual Slavery 
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Japan is openly embellishing sexual slavery committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					 Osaka Mayor Hashimoto, co-head of the Japan Restoration Party, blustered in May last that the practice of using women to work in front-line brothels before and during World War II was necessary to maintain discipline in the military. And Shintaro Ishihara, who co-heads the same party with Hashimoto, defended him, saying that "any military is commonly associated with prostitution and that is like a principle of history."
					
					 This was barbarism as it insulted not only the women who were forced into disgraceful sexual servitude for the Japanese imperialists in the past but also human conscience.
					
					 Japan's attitude toward the sexual slavery is an outstanding issue directly linked with its admission, apology and reparation for all the crimes it committed against mankind in the last century. This is because the sexual slavery was the most corrupt and bestial one among all the crimes committed by the Imperial Japanese Army during the war, a hideous inhuman crime which baffled human imagination.
					
					 Japan's denial of the sexual slavery means a denial of its crime-woven past and a challenge to justice and human conscience.
					
					 That is why the international community is unanimously expressing indignation, rebuff and condemnation of Japan's attitude to evade the blame for the sexual slavery at any cost.
					
					 But the right-wing forces of Japan have gone the lengths of claiming "necessity" and "truth", not content with letting loose a spate of reckless remarks on the issue of sexual slavery.
					
					  They are now seeking to evade the liquidation of the past by embellishing the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity and incite militarism among Japanese in a bid to realize the ambition for "the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					  Japan is, indeed, a state which suffered a total ruin in the aspect of morality and a dangerous enemy state which can throw our planet again into misfortune by committing all sorts of crimes against humanity.
					
					  The moves of the right-wing forces to shun the liquidation of the past lead to a self-destruction as they becloud the prospect of Japan.
					
					 Voices denouncing the right-wing politicians for praising the above-said bestial acts as "acts of hurting the state interests" continue ringing out even in Japan.
					
					  If they persist in such crimes, far from drawing a lesson in the past, Japan will not be able to escape a ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged Not to Block Joint National Events
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged Not to Block Joint National Events 
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Association of Korean Youth in China issued a statement titled "South Korean authorities should not block joint national events" on May 29.
					 The statement said the DPRK proposed jointly holding events marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration with Koreans from the north and the south and abroad represented there.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities flatly rejected the proposal, talking about "suspicion as to the sincerity of the north" and saying "it is aimed to create contradiction among southerners" and "it contained a political intention", the statement charged.
					
					 Such act of the south Korean authorities are a grave provocation against the Korean nation desirous of detente and improved inter-Korean relations and a shameless challenge to public opinion at home and abroad as they constitute the height of the confrontation against national reunification, it held.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are strongly opposed to the discussion on national concord and reunification at the events marking the anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration by the Koreans themselves, fully revealing their true colors as anti-reunification maniacs, it said.
					
					 Their moves should never be pardoned as they are an unpardonable insult to the aspiration of the fellow countrymen, it said, and went on:
					
					 All the members of the Association of Korean Youth in China strongly demand the south Korean authorities accept the proposal of the DPRK on holding the joint national events marking the 13th anniversary of the historic north-south joint declaration and immediately allow the organizations of the south side to take part in the events.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservatives Accused of Tampering with History
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservatives Accused of Tampering with History
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A broad spectrum of south Koreans blasted the puppet conservative group's distortion of history in textbook, according to the south Korean paper Kyunghyang Daily News on Monday.
					 Shortly ago, the history textbook written by the conservative group by distorting the history of the south Korean people's movement for freedom, democracy and reunification was passed in the examination for approval.
					
					 Such hideous moves putting the preceding dictators into the shade have been openly committed under the present regime, stirring the strong protests of people from all walks of life.
					
					 The education inspector in Kwangju City said that the textbook recently written by the conservative group contained the contents defiling the May 18 Kwangju Uprising and the April 19 Uprising.
					
					 He asserted that such an unreasonable act of denying the struggle for democracy in south Korea can never be overlooked.
					
					 He underlined the need to take a strong countermeasure to stem the conservative group's distortion of history in textbook.
					
					 The chairman of the History Teachers Association said it is absurd for the conservative group to brand all the textbooks now in use as leftist ones.
					
					 A history teacher in Seoul said the conservative group's act of distorting the history in textbook is aimed to openly fan up pro-Japanese sentiment and to regard anything against it as pro-north, emphasizing the need to check such moves.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Solidarity Council for Education in History made up of history teachers and experts called for strongly coping with the conservative forces' distortion of history and retrogressive revision of the textbook in the future.

articles.title: Marathon for Reunification Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Marathon for Reunification Held in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A marathon for Korea's reunification marking  the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration took place in Jonju City, North Jolla Province on June 2 under the sponsorship of the North Jolla Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					 The marathon brought together at least 3 000 people of all social standings.
					
					 The full text of the north-south joint declaration was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers said this event was organized in reflection of the will for peace and reunification.
					
					 National reunification is a way to survive and a war leads to death, they noted, calling on all people to pool their efforts for building a peace-keeping mechanism. 
					
					 Then the marathon started.
					
					 After kicking it off, chanting slogans "No War!" and "For Peace!" the participants ran 6.15 km, calling for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Int'l Peace Declaration Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Int'l Peace Declaration Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on May 29 carried the first ad related to the international peace declaration for ensuring peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					 It is 60 years since the Armistice Agreement was concluded, but the worst military tension is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula, the paper noted, and went on:
					
					 During the last six decades all Koreans and the world peace-loving people opposed to war have pressed for replacing the cease-fire mechanism on the peninsula by a lasting peace-keeping mechanism as early as possible.
					
					 They, at the same time, called for removing the Cold War structure which has been maintained and consolidated under the pretext of Korea's division and ushering in a new era of peace and cooperation.
					
					 The negotiations for concluding a peace treaty, however, have not yet started but the military tension has escalated as the days go by.
					
					 It is necessary to ensure durable peace on the peninsula through the conclusion of the peace treaty and thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration agreed upon between the north and the south and supported by the international community.

articles.title: Sultan of Brunei Hopes for Boost of Friendly, Cooperative Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Sultan of Brunei Hopes for Boost of Friendly, Cooperative Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador to Brunei Darussalam Jang Yong Chol presented credentials to Haji Hassanal Bolkiah, sultan and head of state of that country, on May 25.
					 The sultan said he is satisfied with the fact that the friendly and cooperative relations between Brunei and the DPRK are developing in the interests of the peoples of the two countries, expressing expectation that the relations would grow strong in various fields in the future, too.
					
					 Highly appreciating the DPRK's efforts for the regional stability, peace and prosperity, he hoped that the Korean people would register bigger success in building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in France
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in France
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A French preparatory committee to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated in Paris on May 31.
					 Andre Aubry, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee fixed the period from June 1 to July 27 as a celebration period and decided to organize diverse political and cultural events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Personages of Bulgaria, France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Personages of Bulgaria, France
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il took place in Bulgaria and France on May 27 and 30 to mark the 49th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A reporter and speakers including the secretary general of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, the chairman of the Central Council of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, the secretary general of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union said that Kim Jong Il had developed the WPK into the staff of revolution successfully guiding the Korean people's cause of independence against imperialism and socialist construction for nearly half a century since he started his work at the C.C., WPK on June 19, 1964.
					
					 He reliably defended the peace and security of socialist Korea and the world by pursuing original Songun politics, they noted.
					
					 The chairman of a regional committee of the France-Korea Friendship Association said Kim Jong Il had developed the WPK into the Kimilsungist party and the mother party truly serving the people from the very day he started his work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country by shattering the moves of the U.S.-led imperialists to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 We will more dynamically wage the activities for supporting the just cause of the Korean people to build a thriving nation and reunify the country independently and peacefully, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un emite llamamiento  a todo el ejercito y pueblo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un emite llamamiento  a todo el ejercito y pueblo 
						
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 4 a todo el ejercito y pueblo de Corea el llamamiento "Abramos una nueva era de apogeo en todos los frentes de la construccion socialista mediante la creacion de la ´velocidad Masikryong´".
					En el texto, apunto que la construccion del campo de esqui del desfiladero Masik es una gigantesca obra patriotica del PTC para ofrecer al pueblo mejores condiciones de vida cultural llevando a la realidad el noble deseo del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes amaban tanto al pueblo.
					
					Recordo que en menos de un ano desde el inicio de la obra, los constructores militares registraron el asombroso exito de remover las rocas naturales y lomitas abruptas y extender las pistas de esqui con una superficie de cientos de miles de metros cuadrados y una longitud de mas de 100 mil metros.
					
					Ratifico la firme decision del PTC de ofrecer las condiciones de vida mas culta y feliz al pueblo y los jovenes y ninos escolares al terminar este ano la construccion del campo de esqui de talla mundial, a pesar de que esta obra es tan inmensa que demoraria mas de 10 anos en otros paises.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que los constructores militares terminaran la obra dentro de este ano al crear la "velocidad Masikryong" con sus indoblegables fuerzas espirituales y con ofensiva tenaz y de que el ejercito y el pueblo de todo el pais registraran gran salto e innovaciones en todos los sectores de la construccion socialista trabajando con el mismo espiritu e impetu de los uniformados.
					
					Indico que la clave para adelantar la construccion esta en movilizar las fuerzas espirituales de las masas militares y que el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il es el fundamento de esas fuerzas que deben tener todos los constructores militares.
					
					Subrayo que se debe impulsar energicamente la obra usando las fuerzas de gran unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo, cosa mas importante de la revolucion del Songun y base de nuestra sociedad.
					
					Enfatizo que el PTC tiene la voluntad y decision de avivar en todo el pais las llamas de gran innovacion y gran salto al aprender el indoblegable espiritu y estilo de lucha que manifiestan los militares en la obra.
					
					Senalo que el EPC debe crear incesantes innovaciones en los preparativos de combate y en todos los importantes proyectos de construccion y el acondicionamiento de las provincias, ciudades y distritos.
					
					Llamo a los obreros, trabajadores agricolas, intelectuales y otros habitantes a activar aun mas la economia en general del pais y contribuir mucho al cumplimiento del plan de economia nacional ateniendose a la linea del partido de impulsar paralelamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares.

articles.title: Vocero del CC de ACR condena rapto de jovenes y ninos norcoreanos
articles.content:
Vocero del CC de ACR condena rapto de jovenes y ninos norcoreanos
						
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, se ha descubierto el inaudito crimen antietico cometido por los titeres surcoreanos que secuestraron a los jovenes y ninos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y trataron de llevarlos en colectivo al territorio surcoreano.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la RPDC hizo publica hoy una declaracion de condena.
					
					Segun la nota, los traficantes de personas, disfrazados de religiosos y enviados por la camarilla titere surcoreana a la zona fronteriza septentrional de la RPDC, encerraron en un escondrijo a decenas de jovenes y ninos norcoreanos raptados y secuestrados y les cometieron vejaciones de toda indole.
					
					Para evitar la inspeccion en el pais correspondiente, esos tipejos, habituados a la campana de enfrentamiento y complot contra la RPDC, cambiaron varias veces el lugar de residencia y en 2-3 anos, obligaron a los secuestrados a aprender la Biblia y el cantico de iglesia inyectandoles por la fuerza la religion, revela el texto y prosigue:
					
					Ademas cometieron la limpieza de cerebro encaminada a hacer a los raptados, mediante la proyeccion de peliculas de contenido malsano, insultar la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC y abrigar ilusion de la sociedad surcoreana.
					
					A los ninos atrasados en la educacion religiosa y la limpieza de cerebro, les aplicaron horrendos castigos, tales como dar golpes con palos de hierro y ponerlos de pie largo tiempo.
					
					9 jovenes y ninos en cuestion son una parte de las victimas de tales fechorias.
					
					Mientras intentaban llevar ilegalmente a ellos al Sur de Corea haciendo escala en otros paises, los titeres surcoreanos fueron descubiertos y no pudieron cumplir su intento.
					
					En confabulacion con las entidades de Estados Unidos que traman intrigas anti-RPDC en el tema de DDHH, lanzaron a los traficantes de personas a la seduccion y secuestro de nuestros jovenes y ninos invirtiendo fabulosos fondos.
					
					Movilizando sus representaciones en el extranjero, entregaron a los raptados los pasaportes falsificados y prepararon el avion para trasladarlos al Sur de Corea, EE.UU., etc.
					
					El presente incidente pone a toda luz cuan barbaros son los casos de trata de personas cometidos por los titeres surcoreanos y cuan hipocritas son estos que lanzan la ofensiva  anti-RPDC en la esfera de DDHH.
					
					El complot de ese tipo es un esfuerzo agonico para salir del aprieto y desventaja al mellar la imagen de la RPDC y frenar la corriente de la situacion internacional en brusco cambio.
					
					Significa ademas una artimana tendente a sembrar cizanas entre la RPDC y los paises vinculados, dar destaque al inexistente "problema de DDHH" de ella e intensificar asi la campana anti-RPDC.
					
					En lo tocante al tema de DDHH, el que debe ser enjuiciado es la banda titere surcoreana que convirtio el territorio surcoreano en escenario caotico de dictadura fascista y en tumba para democracia y derechos humanos y encarcelo a las personalidades partidarias de reunificacion que visitaron a la RPDC con el sentimiento fraternal.
					
					Ademas, debe ser acusado primero EE.UU., peor violador de derechos humanos, que en el Sur de Corea comete los crimenes de peor calana como violacion sexual, acciones violentas y asesinato y tortura y ejecuta en Guantanamo a los reos inocentes.
					
					Ahora, en contubernio con los elementos de la entidad intrigante de DDHH, la camarilla surcoreana recrudece la campana anti-RPDC hablando de "garantizar la vida de los jovenes y ninos fugados y devueltos en contra de su voluntad al Norte" y de instituir la "ley de DDHH del Norte", lo cual pone de relieve su naturaleza conflictiva y anti-reunificacion.
					
					En la RPDC, donde esta establecido generalmente el regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares y todas las personas forman una gran familia en virtud de la politica de amor al pueblo, se aseguran perfectamente los derechos humanos de las masas populares, inclusive los jovenes y ninos.
					
					Si los titeres surcoreanos continuan con su campana anti-RPDC en la esfera de DDHH, inclusive la seduccion y secuestro de habitantes norcoreanos, haciendo oidos sordos a las reiteradas advertencias nuestras, lo pagaran muy caro.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju expresa condolencias a su homologo chino
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju expresa condolencias a su homologo chino
						
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo de que se reportaron muchas perdidas humanas y materiales en un incendio ocurrido recientemente en la provincia de Jilin de China, el premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, envio el dia 4 un mensaje de condolencias a su par chino, Li Keqiang.
					Convencido de que seran resarcidas cuanto antes las secuelas del desastre gracias a los ingentes esfuerzos del gobierno y pueblo chinos, el remitente expresa profunda compasion y condolencias al gobierno y pueblo chinos, a las victimas y sus familiares.

articles.title: Aprobada Ley de la Zona de Desarrollo Economico en RPDC
articles.content:
Aprobada Ley de la Zona de Desarrollo Economico en RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ACNC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el 29 de mayo un decreto sobre la aprobacion de la Ley de la Zona de Desarrollo Economico (ZDE).
					  La nueva ley tiene 7 capitulos (62 articulos) y la disposicion suplementaria (2 articulos).
					
					  Estan referidos la esencia de la ley, la fundacion, el desarrollo y la administracion de la ZDE, las actividades economicas, el fomento y la concesion de prerrogativas en ella, la solucion de quejas y diferendos.
					
					  Segun la ley, la Zona de Desarrollo Economico es la region economica especial donde se concede prerrogativas a las actividades economicas segun la ley instituida especialmente por el Estado.
					
					  Alli se incluyen la zona de desarrollo industrial, la agricola, la turistica, la de desarrollo de tecnologias de punta, la zona de elaboracion para la exportacion y otras regiones del sector economico y el cientifico-tecnico.
					
					  El Estado exige administrar la zona, segun la unidad administradora a que pertenezca, estableciendo la de nivel local y la de nivel central.
					
					  La persona juridica, el individuo, la organizacion economica de otros paises y los coreanos residentes en ultramar pueden invertir en la zona, fundar empresa, sucursal, oficina, etc. y realizar libremente las actividades economicas.
					
					  El Estado asegura al inversionista las condiciones preferentes de actividades economicas en las esferas como el uso de tierra, el empleo de la mano de obra y el pago de impuestos.
					
					  En la ZDE se promueve especialmente la inversion en el sector de construccion de infraestructura, el de ciencia y tecnica de punta y el de produccion de las mercancias con alta competitividad en el mercado internacional.
					
					  Alli son protegidos por ley el derecho dado al inversionista, los bienes invertidos y los ingresos legitimos.
					
					  En las actividades economicas como el desarrollo, la administracion y la gestion empresarial de la ZDE se aplican la presente ley y las reglas y estatutos detallados para su implementacion.
					
					  Esta ley no se aplica en la zona economica y comercial de Rason, las zonas economicas de las islas Hwanggumphyong y Wihwa, la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y la Zona Especial del Turismo Internacional al Monte Kumgang.
